mapper.insert: insert into review_info(ri_content, ui_id, ri_movie_id, ri_star, ri_direction_point, ri_acting_point, ri_story_point, ri_visual_point, ri_ost_point, ri_genre, ri_spoil) values (#{riContent}, #{uiId}, #{riMovieId}, #{riStar}, #{riDirectionPoint}, #{riActingPoint}, #{riStoryPoint}, #{riVisualPoint}, #{riOstPoint}, #{riGenre}, #{riSpoil})
